name: Rafael Mello
about:
Software Engineer with more than ten years of experience in main development technologies. I have experience building systems for various knowledge areas, including retail commerce, finance, hospitality, pharmaceutical industries, internal platforms, as well as contributing to open-source projects.

I am fascinated by learning about different cultures and exploring new places around the world. In my free time, at home, I enjoy watching movies, TV series, and anime, as well as playing games.
